trans-unit.source: Provides detailed information about a <see langword="TextFragment" />.

<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instances are obtained from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> インスタンスがから取得した、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>で<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>オブジェクト。

trans-unit.source: The information in <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> is obtained by parsing the attributes decorating speech text in the Synthesize Speech Markup Language (SSML) used as an input to a synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: 情報は、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>音声テキストで合成音声マークアップ言語 () 使用される SSML が、合成エンジンへの入力としての装飾の属性を解析して取得されます。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object can exist for any synthesizer action request as specified by its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>すべてシンセサイザー アクションの要求で指定されたオブジェクトが存在できる、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>プロパティです。

trans-unit.source: However, the meaning of its members may change for different actions.
trans-unit.target: ただし、そのメンバーの意味は、さまざまな操作を変更できます。

trans-unit.source: For more information on synthesize actions, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> for more information about specifying synthesizer actions.
trans-unit.target: 詳細については、合成の操作を参照してください<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>詳細については、シンセサイザー アクションを指定します。

trans-unit.source: Specification and control of the quality of the spoken output is largely handled through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Prosody%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>
trans-unit.target: 仕様音声出力の品質のコントロールは多くによっておよび処理される、 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Prosody%2A>、 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>、および <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>

trans-unit.source: Phonetic, language, and linguist structure information is available through <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.LangId%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 経由 Phonetic、言語、および翻訳者の構造情報がある<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.LangId%2A>、 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>、および<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A>です。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction" /> enumeration that specifies a speech synthesis action.
The id of the language being used.
Corresponds to the XML <c>xml:lang</c> attribute.
The emphasis to be applied to speech output or pauses.
The time allotted to speak the text of the <see langword="TextFragment" />.

A member of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs" /> class, indicating the type of text of the <see langword="TextFragment" /> and the level of detail required for accurate rendering of the contained text.
Corresponds to the <c><say-as></c> XML tag in the SSML specification
The argument may be <see langword="null." />
A <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody" /> object indicating characteristics of the speech output such as pitch, speaking rate and volume.
Corresponds to the <c><prosody></c> XML tag in the SSML specification

An array of <see langword="char" /> objects providing the phonetic pronunciation for text contained in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />, using the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) specification.
Corresponds to the <c><phoneme></c> XML tag in the SSML specification.
This argument may be <see langword="null" />.
Constructs a new instance of <see langword="FragmentState" />.
Typically, applications do not directly construct <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> objects.
trans-unit.target: 通常、アプリケーション直接構築しないで<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>オブジェクト。

trans-unit.source: Instead, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instances are created by applications using the members of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> name space.
trans-unit.target: 代わりに、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>インスタンスのメンバーを使用してアプリケーションによって作成されます、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>領域の名前を付けます。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> value specified by the `action` argument is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>, the value supplied by the `emphasis` argument is either:
trans-unit.target: 場合、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>によって指定された値、`action`引数は<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>、によって提供される値、`emphasis`引数は、いずれか。

trans-unit.source: If positive, the time in millisecond to pause
trans-unit.target: 場合は、正の値を一時停止するミリ秒単位の時間

trans-unit.source: If negative a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> enumeration
trans-unit.target: 場合のメンバーを負、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>列挙型

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> value specified by the `action` argument is not <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>`emphasis` argument must be of type <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>.
trans-unit.target: 場合、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>によって指定された値、`action`引数ではありません<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>`emphasis`引数が型である必要があります<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>です。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `duration` argument and The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Duration%2A> property or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> object specified by the `prosody` argument differ, the value on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> object is used.
trans-unit.target: 場合の値、`duration`引数および<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Duration%2A>プロパティまたは<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody>で指定されたオブジェクト、`prosody`引数では異なる、値、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody>オブジェクトを使用します。

trans-unit.source: Returns the requested speech synthesizer action.
A member of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction" /> indicating the speech synthesis action requested by SSML input.
trans-unit.target: SSML 入力で要求された音声合成の操作を示す <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction" /> のメンバー。

trans-unit.source: Returns the desired time for rendering a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />
Returns an <see langword="int" /> containing a value in millisecond of the desired time for rendering a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> を表示するのに適した時間について、ミリ秒単位の値を含む <see langword="int" /> を返します。

trans-unit.source: Returns instructions on how to emphasize a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
Returns an <see langword="int" /> value indicating how to emphasize a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> を強調する方法を示す <see langword="int" /> 値を返します。

trans-unit.source: The interpretation of the value returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> depends on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> value returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the current <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>.
trans-unit.target: によって返される値の解釈<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>によって異なります、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>によって返される値、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>現在プロパティ<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>です。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>
trans-unit.target: 場合の値<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>は <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> is positive, the value returned should be interpreted as the length of the silence in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 場合<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>が正の値であり、返される値はミリ秒単位でサイレント状態の長さとして解釈する必要があります。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> is negative, the value returned should be interpreted as a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>.
trans-unit.target: 場合<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>は負の場合、返される値のメンバーとして解釈するか、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>です。

trans-unit.source: Emphasis information returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> when the property <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence> corresponds to the attributes of the `<break>` element of SSML input to a speech synthesizer engine.
trans-unit.target: によって返される情報を強調<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>ときに、プロパティ<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>は<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>の属性に対応する、 `<break>` SSML 入力音声シンセサイザー エンジンへの要素。

trans-unit.source: For all other values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> values should be interpreted as being of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>.
trans-unit.target: その他のすべての値について<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>として値を解釈する必要があります<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>です。

trans-unit.source: Emphasis information returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> for spoken words corresponds to the attributes of the `<emphasis>` element of SSML input to a speech synthesizer engine.
trans-unit.target: によって返される情報を強調<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>読み上げられる単語の属性に対応、 `<emphasis>` SSML 入力音声シンセサイザー エンジンへの要素。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> describes the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state as another <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> instance, or an [Object](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) which can be cast to <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
An object that can be cast to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />

Determines if a given object is an instance <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> equal to the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.

Returns <see langword="true" />, if the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> and that obtained from the [Object](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) provided by the <paramref name="obj" /> argument describe the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.

Returns <see langword="false" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> and the <paramref name="obj" /> argument do not support the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.

The method return false if the [Object](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) provided by the `obj` argument cannot be cast to <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: メソッドの戻り値の false 場合、[オブジェクト](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx)によって提供される、`obj`に引数をキャストできません<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>です。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> that

Determines if a given instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> is equal to the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.

Returns <see langword="true" />, if both the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> and that supplied through the <paramref name="other" /> argument describe the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.

Returns <see langword="false" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> and the <paramref name="other" /> argument do not support the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A 32-bit signed integer that is the hash code for this instance.
Returns the language supported by the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.
Returns an <see langword="int" /> containing an identifier for the language used by the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.
trans-unit.target: 現在の <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> が使用する言語の識別子を含む <see langword="int" /> を返します。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.LangId%2A> are those used with the Windows Speech API (SAPI) and are generated from the "`xml:lang`" attribute on SSML input to a speech synthesizer engine.
trans-unit.target: 値<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.LangId%2A>Windows Speech API (SAPI) で使用されているから生成されると、"`xml:lang`"音声シンセサイザー エンジンへの SSML 入力の属性です。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> whose described state is compared against the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> provided by the <c>state2</c> argument.

An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> whose described state is compared against the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> provided by the <c>state1</c> argument.
Determines if two instances of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> describes the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.

Returns <see langword="true" /> if both instances of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />, <paramref name="state1" /> and <paramref name="state2" />, describe the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state, otherwise <see langword="false" /> is returned.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: この演算子を同等の方法は<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>します。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> whose described state is compared against the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> provided by the <c>state2</c> argument.

An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> whose described state is compared against the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> provided by the <c>state1</c> argument.
Determines if two instances of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> describes the different <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.

Returns <see langword="true" /> if both instances of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />, <paramref name="state1" /> and <paramref name="state2" />, do not describe the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state, otherwise <see langword="false" /> is returned.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: この演算子を同等の方法は<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>します。

trans-unit.source: Returns phonetic information for a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />
The information returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> property corresponds to the `<phoneme>` XML tag of SSML input to a synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: によって返される情報、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>プロパティに対応して、 `<phoneme>` SSML 入力合成エンジンへの XML タグ。

trans-unit.source: The array of `char` objects returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> property expresses pronunciation using the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA).
trans-unit.target: 配列`char`によって返されるオブジェクト<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>プロパティは国際音声記号 (IPA) を使用して発音を表します。

trans-unit.source: Returns detailed information about the pitch, speaking rate, and volume of speech output.
Returns a valid instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody" /> containing the pitch, speaking rate, and volume settings, and changes to those setting, for speech output.
trans-unit.target: 音声出力に関して、声の高さ、読み上げ速度、音量の設定、およびこうした設定への変更を含む <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody" /> の有効なインスタンスを返します。

trans-unit.source: The information returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> corresponds to the `<prosody>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: によって返される情報<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody>に対応する、 `<prosody>` SSML の仕様内の XML タグ

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the context for the generation of speech from text..

Returns a value <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs" /> instance if the SSML used by a speech synthesis engine contains detailed information about the context to be used to generate speech, otherwise <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 音声複合エンジンで使用される SSML が、音声の生成に使用されるコンテキストに関する詳細な情報を含んでいる場合は値 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs" /> のインスタンスを返します。そうでない場合は <see langword="null" /> を返します。

trans-unit.source: The information returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A> corresponds to the `<say-as>` tag and its attributes in the SSML specification, and can specify:
trans-unit.target: によって返される情報<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A>に対応する、`<say-as>`タグと SSML の仕様ではその属性を指定します。

trans-unit.source: The content type (such as currency, date, or address) or language construct represented by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: 通貨、日付、またはアドレス) などのコンテンツの種類やによって表される言語コンストラクト<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>のプロパティ、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>です。

trans-unit.source: Optional formatting information to handle the content type represented by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, for example, a date syntax.
trans-unit.target: によって表されるコンテンツの種類を処理する情報を書式設定オプション<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>のプロパティ、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>など、日付の構文。

trans-unit.source: The detail to be used in generating speech from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, for example, whether to explicitly render punctuation.
trans-unit.target: 音声の生成に使用する詳細情報、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>のプロパティ、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>など、区切り記号を明示的にレンダリングするかどうか。
